subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Williams, who struggled after being acquired by the Nets amid huge expectations in 2011, returned to New York to face the Knicks with a new team, the Mavericks, and a new outlook.
snippet: Williams, who struggled after being acquired by the Nets amid huge expectations in 2011, returned to New York to face the Knicks with a new team, the Mavericks, and a new outlook.
